title: 'One of the worst dismissals I've seen' - Smith gifts wicket to Australia
description: Jamie Smith gifts his wicket to Australia as he's caught for 46 off the bowling of part-time bowler Marnus Labuschagne, as England fall to 323-6 just before lunch on day two of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: 'He can bat in Australia!' - Root hits sublime 160 for England
description: Watch the best shots of Joe Root's first innings as he scores an impressive 160 to help England to 384 all out against Australia on day two of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: Rosenior as good a coach as I've ever worked with - Rooney
description: With Liam Rosenior in talks to fill the vacant manager's role at Chelsea, Wayne Rooney speaks on his former Derby County colleague and explains why he thinks Rosenior deserves to manage in the Premier League.

title: Root receives standing ovation as sublime innings comes to an end
description: Joe Root's excellent first innings comes to an end as he's caught and bowled by Michael Neser for 160, to leave England on 384-9 on day two of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: 'Amorim's toxic exit the latest chaotic chapter in Ratcliffe's reign'
description: Ruben Amorim's acrimonious exit is the latest example of Manchester United's chaos and instability under Sir Jim Ratcliffe, says Phil McNulty.

title: Feyi-Waboso sparkles, trash-talking Searle and Quirke conundrum - Prem talking points
description: Immanuel Feyi-Waboso's fast feet light up the Rec despite Exeter's defeat, while Leicester fly-half Billy Searle riles Saracens' old guard

title: How Nancy's calamitous 33-day reign unfolded at Celtic
description: BBC Sport takes an amble through Wilfried Nancy's short tenure as Celtic manager.

title: Can you name every Man Utd boss since Ferguson?
description: With Ruben Amorim leaving, we ask: Can you name every manager or head coach to lead Manchester United since Sir Alex Ferguson's retirement in 2013?

title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
description: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

title: Head? Stokes? Starc? Pick your team of the Ashes
description: Australia have retained the Ashes, but who makes your combined team of the series?

title: 'Struggling Frank trapped in gilded cage at joyless Tottenham'
description: Struggling head coach Thomas Frank is trapped in a gilded cage at joyless Tottenham Hotspur, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.

title: 'Raise hell' - the fastest bowler you might not have heard of
description: The story of Duncan Spencer, the "frighteningly fast" bowler who could have played for England or Australia.
